links: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..141, flattened
maple: with(numtheory):T:= (n, k)-> add(phi(d)*k^(n/d), d=divisors(n)):seq(seq(T(n, k), k=1..n), n=1..10); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 28 2013
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[EulerPhi[d]*k^(n/d), {d, Divisors[n]}]; Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 10}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 25 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) T(n, k) = sumdiv(n, d, eulerphi(d)*k^(n/d)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 25 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 16 2000
